Professional Photography

It's my passion and my work.

From products to people, my career is defined by photography. Whether on location or in the studio, I'm hear to provide solutions to your photography needs from digital to print.

-Frank Nash

Client List

I've had the pleasure to work with the following incredible customers, mostly all right here in Metro Detroit.

Gatorade

Frank Nash

I started Nash Photographic in 1987.

As a kid, I never consciously thought of becoming a commercial photographer. I was simply fascinated by the way images would magically appear in a tray of Dektrol in my Mom's makeshift bathroom lab. To me, the camera and a roll of tri-x was just the coolest way to be hip and creative at the same time.

Yet, here I am, 40 years later, still getting that same rush from watching a digital image appear on the computer. My prio career as a pre-press technician made the switch to digital seem like a walk in the park. And as long as that fascination continues, I'll be pushing my craft and creating images that can deliver a visual message to your audience.

Drop me a line if you'd like to discuss how I can help with your next project.

-Frank

People

Action

Action shots can capture the essence of your customer engaging with your product. It's about connecting a brand with a persona, and helping your customer see themselves engaging with your product.
